title: Hotel and Motel Red Book
additional-note: Predecessors of the 1963 Red Book were published under different titles as far back as 1886.  If considering a predecessor volume before 1963, check for renewals under its specific title.  We have not checked all possible titles, but we have searched active renewals in CCE and the registered works database and have not found any renewed titles containing all of the words 'hotel', 'red', and 'book'.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
